p: Conceived and designed the models: D.G., K.L. and X.Z. Performed the simulations: D.G. Analyzed the data: D.G. Contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools: K.P. and X.Z. Wrote the paper: D.G. Provided ideas to improve the system modeling: K.L., B.S., K.P. and T.P. Provided ideas about how to simulate the intervention strategies: D.G. and K.P.
